entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is described as being in his last month with the Dursleys, and it's mentioned that he has a new owl named Hedwig.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin. He is described as being scared of Harry and not wanting to stay in the same room as him.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt. She is mentioned as not speaking to Harry at all during his last month with the Dursleys.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle. He is mentioned as not speaking to Harry at all during his last month with the Dursleys.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's new owl. She is described as swooping in and out of the open window, bringing back things for Harry.

relationships.description: Dudley is scared of Harry and doesn't want to stay in the same room as him.
Aunt Petunia doesn't speak to Harry at all during his last month with the Dursleys.
Uncle Vernon doesn't speak to Harry at all during his last month with the Dursleys.
Hedwig is Harry's new owl and companion. She is described as swooping in and out of the open window, bringing back things for Harry.
